title: Ancient Order of Hibernians hit out at Donald Trump’s racist post about Barack and Michelle Obama
description: The depiction of former US president Barack Obama and his wife Michelle as apes in a video that was shared from President Trump's social media account has been condemned by America’s oldest and largest Irish Catholic organisation.

title: GLOBALink | Festive vibes ahead of Spring Festival in ancient villages of E China's Anhui
description: YIXIAN, Feb. 8 (Xinhua) -- Ancient villages in Yixian County of east China's Anhui Province are filled with festive vibes as the Spring Festival approaches. Locals follow folk customs by making steamed rice cakes, fish lanterns, and writing spring couplets, drawing tourists to share the festive joy together.Produced by Xinhua Global Service

title: Menorca Travel Guide: The Mediterranean’s Best-Kept Secret for Sustainable Luxury and Ancient History
description: Menorca Travel Guide: The Mediterranean’s Best-Kept Secret for Sustainable Luxury and Ancient HistoryExplore the UNESCO sites of Menorca, turquoise coves, and slow-paced charm. title: 'Fun' light exhibition tells story of ancient Bible
description: The Codex Amiatinus was produced at the twin monasteries of Wearmouth and Jarrow in the 700s.
